mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, BIRTHDAY, PHONE, COUNTRY_ID) VALUES (SEQ_MEM_ID.NEXTVAL , #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{countryId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND DELETED_AT IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET PHONE = #{ phone }, NICKNAME = #{ nickname }, COUNTRY_ID = #{ countryId } WHERE EMAIL = #{ email } AND PASSWORD = #{ password } AND DELETED_AT IS NULL
